original_text: From the soldiers who fought in the battle, set apart as tribute for the Lord one out of every five hundred, whether people, cattle, donkeys or sheep.
korean_text: 전쟁에 나갔던 군인들은 사람이나 소나 나귀나 양 떼의 오백분의 일을 여호와께 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: From the soldiers who fought in the battle
set apart as tribute for the Lord
one out of every five hundred
whether people, cattle, donkeys or sheep
